item.description: After all day at the office, sitting in front of the computer, its nice to get out for some exercise! Join me for an evening stroll through Somerville and Cambridge. Meet at 7:00 at Au Bon Pain 18 Holland St, near Davis station. We will walk down towards Cambridge following the red line. This will be a smaller, less formal walk. We'll decide how long or how far to walk that night. We can duck into a cafe if we get too cold, and we'll never be far from the next T station.
item.name: Red Line Ramble
